mapper.select: SELECT ddos.id orderSplitId, ddos.number number, ddos.create_date createDate, ddos.address_id addressId, ddos.house_id houseId, ddos.is_reservation_deliver isReservationDeliver, ddos.apply_status applystatus FROM dj_deliver_order_split ddos WHERE ddos.apply_status IN (1, 2) AND ddos.storefront_id = #{storefrontId} AND ( ddos.address_id = #{addressId} OR ddos.house_id = #{houseId} )
